verbs.description: < p > The Trump administration 's new policy of [ARGM-MNR: forcibly] [V: separating] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from their parents] will cause irreparable damage to many of the children and is a " great injustice " , doctors said Friday.</p >

< p > The Trump administration 's new policy of forcibly separating children from their parents [V: will] cause irreparable damage to many of the children and is a " great injustice " , doctors said Friday.</p >
